properties.description:
The main US manufacturer of exhaust manifolds
for passenger saloon cars and light trucks. Designs, develops, casts and machines high-quality
 iron exhaust manifolds.  Other products include turbine housings, integrated turbo-manifolds and catalytic converters (Wescast Industries Inc., 2013).

.
properties.address: 6300 18 1/2 Mile Road, Sterling Heights, MI 48314, USA
properties.title: Wescast Industries - Manufacturer -  USA Office

properties.description: On April 8, 2008, Wescast opened an manufacturing base in  Wuhan, China.  This is the prime location for economic and technological development.  The targeted projection for cast manifold manufacturing is aimed for 8 million in the next coming year (Bohong Group Co. Ltd., 2013).
properties.title: Wescast Industries - China Office

properties.description: Formally known as Western Machining, Richard LeVan became the CEO of the company and transformed the cast manifold business into Wescast Industries (Wescast Industries Inc., 2013).

properties.description: This is the prime location where cast manifold are made and distributed.

This foundry was founded in 1999 as it inevitably became known as Wescast Hungary Autopari in 2005.  This location is responsible for design, manufacturing, and sales marketing for cast manifolds relating to diesel and gasoline engines.

properties.description: Wescast Industries has been a leading manufacturer in cast manifolds since 1901.  The company found roots in Wingham, ON as Western Machining before being headquartered in Brantford, ON, Canada .  Wescast is now a subsidiary to a Chinese Company called the Bohong Group (Miller, 2013).
properties.title: Wescast Industries (Acquired by the Bohong Group) - Cast manifold manufacturing and distribution
